definition.para: The name of the engineer(s) who helped create the resource.

instructions.para: Input Lastname, Firstname for all personal names. Use LC Authority File for form of name, if available.
Input Lastname, Firstname for all personal names. Use LC Authority File for form of name, if available.
Input Lastname, Firstname for all personal names that should be indexed at the item level. Use LC Authority File for form of name, if available.

customization.para: Enter the name of the engineer or engineer firm who helped create the architectural work depicted in the image. The name should represent as closely as possible the engineer’s name or the company’s name at the time of the creation of the image. Includes both personal and corporate names.

history.justification: Engineer was known frequently enough in Architecture of the Pacific Northwest to warrant the use of this field.

changeLog.change: Changed original property designed for use with ac to accommodate other collection; for example made the definition applicable to all resources and moved ac-specific property description to a customization. Added an example customization for krab.
Added cdm compound object info for krab
